featured.text: John: Did you take your bikes with you?
By exhaling air from the lungs in short (36) of laughter, breathing is quickened and heartbeats increased, which achieves (37) good as ten minutes on an exercise bike.

definition.zh_def: 一種由兩個輪子和一個踏板驅動的交通工具，通常由人力驅動。
definition.en_def: A vehicle with two wheels that is powered by pedaling.
definition.example: I ride my bike to school every day.
